MailTemp.Subject: Gefingerprints | Application approved confirmation
MailTemp.Body:
Hi $Name$,
Congratulations, your application for GE Fingerprints has been approved.
Please click below link to Login.
$Link$
You can access the system with your registered login details.
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
